name: categories
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool aliexpress_unofficial.
Tool description: DEPRECATED. Will deleted after 2023-03-01
API description: Fetches categories from the AliExpress unofficial API, optionally filtered by locale and country.

locale.description: The locale to filter categories by. Defaults to None.

country.description: The country to filter categories by. Defaults to None.
